hadiths.text: Narrated AbuHurayrah: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: If anyone makes two transactions combined in one bargain, he should have the lesser of the two or it will involve usury

chapter.ara-name: باب فِيمَنْ بَاعَ بَيْعَتَيْنِ فِي بَيْعَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding One Who Does Two Transactions In One
